alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 18 at 2:18PM MST until November 19 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, locally up to 15 inches near Brian Head and 20 inches in the Tushar Range. * WHERE...Southern Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on all mountain routes including SR-20 and SR-143. Travel may become difficult on untreated, seasonal roads.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
